content.body: FWIW, https://runkit.com/rstpflkbkgqetqlavy/bound-call-constructibility shows [bound] function name configurability in node v0.10 and v0.12. There are almost certainly _other_ environments where even this approach will fail, but that is itself detectable so "shim it whenever possible" per https://matrix.to/#/!dGIsaFIukRWLdpurvh:matrix.org/$pxkgqqJrnk2SUTxQ2xugHyqrzjOlDXaQFC7dTuyIrCQ?via=matrix.org remains available.
